metadata.name: Ice Armor #1
metadata.description:
This is the first of a four image, macro photography series captured on a morning of rare and very temporary conditions. Exact temperatures and precipitation leave a small window of time where water is frozen in the act of dripping from tree limbs, leaving an armor-like encasement.
